tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QualityControlChecks (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  stage VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  check_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  result BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  compliance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE production_quality_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stage_name VARCHAR(255),
    check_description TEXT,
    check_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_id INT,
    result_details TEXT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (check_id) REFERENCES production_quality_checks(check_id)
)

CREATE TABLE QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stage_of_production VARCHAR(50),
    check_type VARCHAR(50),
    check_result BOOLEAN
)
